name: Deep Sea Diver (Liz)
description:
You are on a deep sea expedition in a yellow submarine when you suddenly find yourself surrounded by aggressive sea creatures defending their territory.  To defend your vessel, you use a bubble shooter to safely send the creatures away.

W, A, S, D keys are used to move up, left, down, and right.

Left and right arrow keys are used to shoot. 

You must successfully shoot each creature twice in order to defeat it. The first shot will bubble the creature, halting their attacks. The second shot will defeat them. 

Sea squids which are not bubbled will constantly shoot ink blobs. This will damage your vessel. Shoot at the ink to destroy it.

Collect starfish power-ups to become invulnerable for a short time.

Defeat all creatures in a room and then dive into the whirlpool to progress.

Press G to return to main menu.

CIA Game Design 2021
